title.narrative: COMMUNICATION AND PARTNERSHIPS

description.narrative: Enhanced Advocacy, Communication, Social and Behavioural Change to achieve Country Programme results., which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Communication And Advocacy (Covid), Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas (Covid), Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children, adolescents, pregnant women and families have improved skills and knowledge to demand for and contribute to their health and well-being.
